name: Good doktor
description:
Game simulator of the work of a general practitioner in a hospital.
Your goal is to identify diseases in patients and achieve the highest level.
Take care of the routine of the physician, control of coupons and carefully check
each incoming patient for the presence of certain diseases.
Do not make mistakes, because the next mistake will be fatal for the patient.

What do we have to do ?
-Take blood tests
-Measure pressure
-Measure body temperature
-Examine the patient
-Pay attention to symptoms
-Improve abilities
-Check coupons

Challenging gameplay. Over 100,000 random girls.
20 diseases. The resemblance to reality.
